name: Police Boat Rush: 3D Police Boat Racing For kids
name_original: Police Boat Rush: 3D Police Boat Racing For kids
description:
One of the Most addictive Boat Racing game on AppStore!

You are about to take on the most thrilling ride of your life in Police Boat rush.

Ride your boat beyond your imagination and rev up the gas towards enraged enemies.

Race against opponents and destroy them,Boost up your speed like no one else can! Fasten your seat belts. Get ready for the drive of your life!

It's gonna be a tough ride!

* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* Dozens of enemies to destroy
